====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[go]] [[over]]; to [[climb]] over; to [[jump]] over
#: {{zh-x|翻山越嶺|to pass over mountains ridges}}
# {{lb|zh|of time}} to [[pass]]; to [[go through]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} to go [[outside]] of ...; to [[exceed]]; to [[surpass]]
#: {{zh-x|超越|to surpass}}
#: {{zh-x|越界|to overstep a boundary}}
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[turn]], to [[turn around]]
#: {{zh-x|越頭|to turn one's head|MN}}
# [[more]]; [[-er]]
#: {{zh-x|越……越……|the more ..., the more ...}}
#: {{zh-x|越來越……|to become increasingly ...}}
